title: Quick Thousand Island Dressing
directions: Combine mayonnaise, ketchup, pickle relish, Worcestershire sauce, horseradish, and paprika in a bowl; mix well. Cover with plastic wrap and chill before serving.
ingredients: 1/4 cup sweet pickle relish, or more to taste
1 teaspoon prepared horseradish, or more to taste
1/2 teaspoon paprika, or more to taste
